text: Michael Ruhe (born 3 April 1980 in Rinteln) is a German rower. He finished fourth in the eight at the 2004 Summer Olympics. == References == * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rinteln Category:Olympic rowers of Germany Category:Rowers at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:German male rowers Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Germany
title: Michael Ruhe
